QuestData.Title: The Speaker Calls
QuestData.Description:
Magni sent for you to meet him in the Krokul Hovel. He has found something that he believes could help us overcome the Legion's infinite armies.
We need every advantage we can muster if we are to see this war through. You should seek him out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Magni in the Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Magni in the Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank ye fer joinin' me, $Glad:lass;. There's somethin' ye have to see.
